title: Remove Abhijit Da's teacher profile image

requirements.summary: Remove Abhijit Da's teacher profile image from the Teachers component, replacing it with a placeholder avatar or initials-based fallback while preserving all text content
acceptanceCriteria: Abhijit Da's profile card in the Teachers component displays a placeholder avatar or initials fallback instead of an image
All text content for Abhijit Da remains visible: name, classes, subject, experience, and teaching focus
The card layout and styling remain consistent with other teacher profiles

file_operations.description: Replace Abhijit Da's image source (currently using frontend/public/assets/generated/abhijit-da-photo.dim_400x400.png or similar) with a placeholder avatar implementation. Implement an initials-based fallback (showing 'AD' for Abhijit Da) or use a generic avatar icon while preserving all existing text content including name, classes taught (Class 4 – Class 10), subject (Mathematics), experience (5 Years), and teaching focus. Maintain the same card structure, styling, and layout consistency with other teacher profiles (Sonali Ma'am and Santanu Sir).

acceptanceCriteria: The 'Class 4 – 10' notes card in the TeachersNotes component displays a placeholder avatar or initials fallback instead of an image
